item.title: Public apology to Kevin Granville and Constant Méheut
item.description: I am going to make a public apology to Mr. Granville and Mr. Méheut for having quoted them without their authorization. I don’t think they really mind considering they are journalists. I will give more details later.

item.title: Explanations sent to New York Times journalist Constant Méheut
item.description: EXCERPT FROM THE EXPLANATIONS I SENT TO NEW YORK TIMES JOURNALIST CONSTANT MÉHEUT, ON MAY 25 2022 BETWEEN APPROXIMATELY 7:36 PM AND 8:05 PM (BEIJING TIME), BY DIRECT MESSAGING VIA TWITTER.
